title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the popup menu that allows adding breakpoints/marks, etc. does not appear.
EB: 1) Open a Java editor.2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. The expected behavior is for a popup menu to appear, enabling the user to add breakpoints/marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1) Open a Java editor.2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
